attributes.action: Force the government to have e-petitions on UK backed candidates for all EU positions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As all EU positions are un-elected, the Government should set up two petitions (for and against) any person that the UK government back for these positions, and take this democratic feedback into account.

rejection.details: Comments on the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
